channel.title: Making offline client?
channel.description: Alright so I already posted help on the forums got no help now I want to make it offline I made a server offline before but not a fully customized client made by me. !. I never got to fully run the client like log in because no one bothers to help me on how to get my server connected and yes I read the forums. 2 I made an IP adress and all that so right now I give up and what to make it offline. How do I do that. Because it always ask me for like IP and I'm sick of that I just want to play by myslef.

item.title: Making offline client?
item.dc:creator: @Ownage100x Ownage100x
item.description:
@Ownage100x wrote:

rning? so how would I do this like but the source in the client folder or something lol I’m new to blank client stuff but I know how to do it on moparscpae client just not a blank one[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 10:27:12 pm[/size][hr][quote=“jman7, post:6, topic:291644”]well yes.
you still need a scource even if the clients blnk
rning the scource, and the client on ur pc makes it basically “offline” if ur not hosting it[/quote]
lol nevermind I know what you mean lol

Read full topic

item.title: Making offline client?
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

lol just put the ip as 0.0.0.0 and have server running. just because it ask for a server ip doesnt meen some person somewere wants you to conenct. so technically you can play any server u have the scource files for (and java) offline. if you run it and connect to 0.0.0.0 aka 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
